<h1 align="center">
  Cocina Q
</h1>

This is a personal project created to shared my own recipes with everyone. Visit https://cocinaq.com/

## ðŸš€ Instructions:

1.  **Run this command**

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```

2.  **URL to see the page**

    http://localhost:8000/

3.  **URL to GraphiQL**

    http://localhost:8000/___graphql


4.  **Stop the server or kill the process develop mode**
    ```shell
    kill -9 $(lsof -ti:8000)
    ```

5.  **Build production release**

    ```shell
    gatsby build
    ```
6.  **Generate sitemap file**

    ```shell
    gatsby build && gatsby serve
    ```
